subject: Urgent: Your account will be closed
body: We detected suspicious activity in your account. To avoid closure, please verify your account immediately.

subject: Password Reset Required
body: Your password has expired. Please reset immediately using the link below.

subject: Unusual Login Attempt
body: We noticed an unusual login attempt from a new device. Confirm it was you by signing in through the link below.

subject: Payment Failed
body: Your recent payment could not be processed. Update billing information to avoid service interruption.

subject: Confirm Your Identity
body: Your identity must be verified to continue using our services. Click the link below to confirm.

subject: Delivery Issue: Action Needed
body: We could not deliver your package. Please provide the correct address and pay the reshipping fee.

subject: PayPal Alert: Account Limited
body: Your PayPal account has been limited due to suspicious activity. Verify your details to restore access.

subject: Amazon Order Suspended
body: Your Amazon order has been put on hold. Please verify payment details to complete your purchase.

subject: Final Warning: Email Deactivation
body: Your email account will be permanently removed unless you verify your login today.

subject: Your Tax Refund is Ready
body: Claim your tax refund immediately by confirming your personal information at the link below.

subject: Action Required: Bank Account Verification
body: Your bank has noticed irregular activity. Verify your account to avoid temporary hold.

subject: Security Alert: Multiple Failed Logins
body: We registered multiple failed login attempts. Use the secure link to reset your password.

subject: Verify Your Student Loan Details
body: Your student loan information is incomplete. Update details to avoid increased interest.

subject: Office 365 Mailbox Exceeded Limit
body: Your mailbox storage limit has been exceeded. Log in to increase your storage quota.

subject: Unauthorized Access to Your Cloud Drive
body: Someone tried accessing your cloud drive from an unknown device. Review activity below.

subject: University Portal Suspended
body: Your university portal access will be suspended if you do not revalidate your credentials.

subject: Scholarship Application Incomplete
body: Your scholarship application is missing required documents. Upload them using the link.

subject: Fake Internship Offer
body: You have been selected for a paid internship. Provide bank details to receive your first stipend.

subject: Corporate VPN Password Expiring
body: Your VPN password will expire today. Reset immediately to maintain remote access.

subject: Payroll Information Update Required
body: Your payroll details need verification to process this month's salary.

subject: Apple ID Locked
body: Your Apple ID has been locked for security reasons. Restore access by confirming your account.

subject: Microsoft Account Closure Notice
body: Your Microsoft account is scheduled for closure. Cancel this request within 24 hours.

subject: Crypto Wallet Withdrawal Alert
body: A withdrawal request was initiated from your wallet. Cancel it if this was not you.

subject: Social Media Copyright Violation
body: Your account has been reported for copyright violations. Appeal the decision at the link.

subject: Fake KU IT Support Message
body: KU IT has detected suspicious activity on your account. Log in to verify your identity.

subject: Document Shared: Please Sign
body: A confidential document has been shared for your signature. Log in with your email to view it.

subject: Suspicious Activity on Your Email
body: We have blocked new sign-in attempts. Review recent activity and confirm that it was you.

subject: Upgrade to Premium Storage
body: Your free plan is expiring. Upgrade now by entering your card information.

subject: Lottery Winning Notification
body: Congratulations, you have won a prize. Enter your details to claim your reward.

subject: Fake Bank Transfer Notice
body: You have received a large bank transfer. Confirm your account details to receive the funds.

subject: Meeting Reminder
body: Just a reminder that our weekly team meeting is tomorrow at 10 AM in Conference Room B.

subject: Project Update
body: Attached is the latest update for Project Falcon. Please review before Friday and send your feedback.

subject: Class Announcement
body: This is a reminder that your assignment for EECS 465 is due on Monday at midnight.

subject: Schedule Confirmation
body: Please confirm your availability for next week's lab sessions so we can finalize the schedule.

subject: Receipt for Your Purchase
body: Thank you for your purchase. Here is your receipt and order details for your records.

subject: Team Lunch
body: We are planning a team lunch this Friday at the Union. Let us know if you can make it.

subject: University Event
body: Join us for the annual engineering networking event at the KU Union Ballroom next Thursday.

subject: Exam Review Session
body: A review session will be held on Thursday for the midterm exam. Bring your questions.

subject: Login Notification
body: A login to your account was detected from your usual device. No action is required.

subject: Your Subscription is Active
body: Your subscription has been successfully renewed for another year. Thank you for staying with us.

subject: Lab Reservation Confirmed
body: Your reservation for the computer lab has been confirmed for Wednesday 2–4 PM.

subject: Course Enrollment Successful
body: You have been successfully enrolled in EECS 658: Introduction to Machine Learning.

subject: Invoice for Consulting Services
body: Attached is the invoice for last month's consulting services. Payment is due in 30 days.

subject: Welcome to the Platform
body: Welcome to our platform! Explore your dashboard to get started and customize your profile.

subject: Reminder: Office Hours
body: Office hours will be held tomorrow from 2–4 PM in Eaton Hall, room 2001.

subject: Conference Registration Confirmed
body: Your registration for the IEEE student conference has been confirmed.

subject: Parking Permit Renewal
body: Your campus parking permit has been renewed successfully. A new sticker will be mailed soon.

subject: Research Group Meeting
body: Our research group meeting will be held on Friday to discuss progress on current projects.

subject: Assignment Graded
body: Your assignment submission has been graded. Check Canvas to view your score and feedback.

subject: Welcome Email from HR
body: Welcome to the company! HR has attached your onboarding schedule and documentation.

subject: Travel Itinerary
body: Your flight itinerary and hotel booking details are attached for your upcoming conference trip.

subject: Student Housing Information
body: This email contains information about move-in dates and housing policies for the semester.

subject: Workshop Registration
body: You are registered for the Python for Data Science workshop next weekend.

subject: Newsletter: College of Engineering
body: Here is this month's newsletter from the School of Engineering with updates and events.

subject: Grade Posted for Midterm
body: Your grade for the midterm exam has been posted. Please check the course portal.

subject: Zoom Link for Tomorrow's Class
body: Here is the Zoom link for tomorrow's remote lecture. Please log in 5 minutes early.

subject: Scholarship Award Notification
body: Congratulations, you have been selected to receive a departmental scholarship for this year.

subject: Library Book Due Soon
body: One or more of your checked-out library books will be due in three days. Please return or renew.

subject: Project Presentation Schedule
body: The final project presentations are scheduled for next Friday. Your assigned time is 2:30 PM.

subject: System Maintenance Notice
body: Our systems will be undergoing scheduled maintenance on Saturday from 1–3 AM. Some services may be unavailable.
